contents.translated: Made during an ice age, regice’s body was.Melted, the deep-frozen body can’t be,Even by fire.Frigid air of minus 328 degrees f, this pokémon controls.
contents.text: REGICE’s body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozen body can’t be melted, even by fire. This POKéMON controls frigid air of minus 328 degrees F.
